item.title: Dropbear with Mosh on a Low End Server
item.description: I love my low end boxes. I also love mosh. Low end boxes usually are tight on resources, so Dropbear is often used as a lightweight ssh server. Mosh is mostly tested with openssh-client/server, so I think there are some bugs. But it can work, just make sure: You are using the same version of mosh on the server as you are on your client. (otherwise they may not support the same command line options)
